mapper.select: select * from receivers where path_no = #{pathNo} and receivers_receiver = #{receiversReceiver}
mapper.insert: insert into receivers(receivers_no, path_no, receivers_receiver) values(#{receiversNo}, #{pathNo}, #{receiversReceiver})
mapper.update: update receivers set receivers_status ='Y', RECEIVERS_CONFIRM_TIME = SYSDATE , receivers_return_rs= #{receiversReturnRs} where path_no= #{pathNo} and receivers_receiver = #{receiversReceiver}
